sentences.sContent: In each of these cases, one of the models evolved independently of the other.
sentences.sCn: 在这里的每种情况下，其中一个模型独立于另一个模型而发展。

sentences.sContent: Service each copy independently: You can update one copy without affecting any of the other ones.
sentences.sCn: 独立维护每个副本： 可以独立更新某一个副本，而不影响其他的副本。

sentences.sContent: We have two motors, one on each rear wheel, so the control system has to control each motor independently.
sentences.sCn: 而且我们有两个，每一个后轮都有一个，说以控制系统必须独立地控制每一个电机。

sentences.sContent: ...creativity and knowledge in a way that a person working independently cannot; but teamwork may also lead to confusion...
...Students also need to learn to work independently and to make responsible decisions...
...are more likely to think independently or at least see people outside of the economics profession as forming their peer group...

words.tran: 独立的；单独的；无党派的；不受约束的
独立；组合教会制；独立国
